website_summaries.verdict: An expertly-crafted bathroom mirror that will look and perform great in bathrooms of all sizes.
pros: Frame consists of high-end MDF that delivers supreme strength and durability
Comes with a convenient storage shelf that you can use to hold soap, towels and other bathroom essentials
Space-saving design makes the mirror a wonderful choice in bathrooms big and small
Comes with mounting hardware for quick, easy installation
cons: Mirror may be too narrow for some users

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Mirror. Such a perfect size if you’re buying it to use as a makeup vanity mirror. The flat bottom piece is so convenient it allows the mirror to sit flat on top of a desk/table without screwing it to your wall (you can add the screws for more security and to avoid the risk of the mirror falling). Lastly, I added stick on lights which makes it look expensive, it’s perfect and very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Aviles

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase. I bought it specifically because there were few reviews of it being broken upon arrival. Of course when I open it, the mirror is shattered. I am very sad because I love the way it looks and it would have fit perfectly in my room. I know that this is not completely the fault of the seller, as UPS may have handled it incorrectly, but the box did not even have a "Fragile" sticker on it, and the packaging was not that protective. Looks like I will be purchasing a different mirror-sad because I really loved this one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet tasteful
customer_reviews.text: Renovating the efficiency bathroom above our garage, the little shelf provides extra space and the style will work throughout the years.
customer_reviews.author: Peony C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a half bath, was just looking for something inexpensive as it's a super small kid's bathroom. It's really nice for a $40 mirror, but the screw heads are visible on top and under the shelf, and there are some minor imperfections, but I truly didn't mind for the price. I didn't care for the installation - you have to make sure the screws are in the wall level and at the exact distance as the mounting holes - but we got it done. (Since it's light enough I wish I could have hung it with picture wire - would have been much easier - but there was nowhere to attach the wire.) All-in-all, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror !
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror ! It is a little bit on the smaller side but it is very sleek clean beautiful and we are very happy
customer_reviews.author: M. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Versatile to use as a vanity mirror in any room just add LED daylight bulbs❤️
customer_reviews.text: Loved that you can screw/bolt this to a bedroom desk or vanity table, add your own choice of stick on vanity led daylight bulbs for perfect makeup application or hair styling for a client or yourself when you don’t have room in a small apt or home with one bathroom and you want to keep your products out of a guest bath. Great price and perfect size and weight! Would def buy again! A+
customer_reviews.author: Nola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: wanted to put a mirror in our teen daughter's bedroom. Liked the shelf option. Good price, good product. Easy to put together; little knowledge or tools required. Hanging it was the hardest part.... two holes on either side of the frame to hang it from. Looks nice, exactly as described. Arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: My Friends Have Bought Themselves One
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mirror and cannot suggest it enough. It is beautiful, sturdy and easy to put together. The picture I attached shows the beginning stages of my vanity and I could not imagine it without this mirror. It is wonderful for my vanity, and I think it would be beautiful in a bathroom as well. I intend on attaching vanity lights to it, as there is plenty enough room to do so. It stands on the desk and doesn't wobble even one bit. I do not have it attached/hung on the wall. The lip infront is the perfect size. Large enough to place things on, but not so large that it is out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rose McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Antique white
customer_reviews.text: It is cheaply made. You can tell where the parts come together. It’s more antique white which may not be a big deal to some but if you have a bright white bathroom, it’s going to stick out like a sore thumb. I had to paint it before hanging. Hassle in itself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy all around
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was easy to assemble (only a few screws) and install. It looks really good in my bathroom. The trick to hanging it on the wall: 1) Cut a long strip of cardboard from the box it comes in. Make sure one side is the straight side (the side you cut doesn't have to be straight). 2) Turn the mirror around and mark the holes on the straight side of the cardboard using a marker. 3) Use that cardboard strip as a template for your wall. You can measure and level where the mirror will go and it will go up without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful reflection - lol
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, the quality is top notch. The assembly was simply and solid. Some have complained about to difficulty to mount aspect, but if you take proper measurements both vertically and horizontally, you shouldn’t have any issues - mine was super simply to mount perfectly level first try and I’m a basic DIY’er. Can’t go wrong with this mirror. Shelf is super sturdy. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Tony's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, but mine arrived with the edge of the mirror shattered.
customer_reviews.text: The quality didn't appear great; the corners are wobbly and likely to separate in time. It looks like a cheap unit (I know, it cost about the same as one), not one you'd spend a C-Note on (and you should). The edge of the mirror, close to the frame, was shattered so it went back. I cannot recommend it based on quality; yes, it's a $50 mirror at best. Learned my lesson and will buy the one costing the C-Note instead.
customer_reviews.author: Yarburger

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror - perfect for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the mirror because of the shelf at the bottom and how large it was. I still didn't like the shelf which is why I'm giving it 4 stars but you can put it up without the top and bottom pieces which worked much better in my bathroom. The shelf tends to hang out and makes it dark underneath since the light can't get below it. All in all it's a pretty mirror and you can use it both ways.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for putting on my makeup.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mirror in my Master Bathroom. I created a storage system on the back wall of my Master Bathroom. I misread the description thinking this was the mirrored cabinet. Turned out to be a mirror with vanity shelf. It was the best mistake I made. It works great with my other pieces and gives me a mirror to use when I put my makeup on while my husband uses the sink mirror to shave.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would! So disappointed! Had been waiting to hang this for when we completed our bathroom and just took it out of the box and it's broken!
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: They looks exactly how I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I did have an issue with the first delivery (broken mirror) however that was resolved quickly and the replacement arrived quickly. It was very easy to put together and install on the wall. It is out of cheaper material that chips easy however I'm hoping that shouldn't matter too much in a guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: J.Fish

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We installed this mirror in my kids' bathroom (it would look fine in an adult's bathroom too). They have a very small pedestal sink with no place to put anything on or around it, so they've mercilessly loaded up this mirror's little shelf. It's been a few weeks now and it still looks great and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good for use as vanity mirror.
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently using this as a mirror for my makeup desk/vanity. If you’re looking for an inexpensive vanity, I definitely recommend using this mirror (the bottom is flat so it’s easy to attach it to a flat surface. I just attached it with command strips.) and an inexpensive desk. I put my vanity together for about 40 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Neshie

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it was damaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mirror. Unfortunately I received a damaged one. It appears that someone tried to fill in a 3” gouge in the wood frame and scratches on the mirror. See my photos. I was very disappointed because I think it’s a great mirror. Just be sure you look it over for any damage. Reluctantly had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 mirrors and of course one is broken. Finally after days and days I received the replacement and it’s a different color! We just got back home from a house fire we had in February. Just wanted a couple of new mirrors for the bathroom. Not happy at all!!! SEE PIC 2 DIFFERENT COLORS 🙄
customer_reviews.author: danielle t

customer_reviews.title: Be sure and measure your space
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mirror with a small shelf for the guest bathroom as there is zero counterspace. My goof was in not measuring the space between the sink and the light fixture. The mirror fits, just barely -- my fault for not checking the measurements. I think it looks great and I love the little shelf.
customer_reviews.author: B. Copenhaver

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom upgrade piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece and went along way to help upgrade our half bath. I love how it looks in the bathroom now, it’s clean and looks more expensive than it is. I had a really hard time hanging it up though and getting it even.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Very solid, looks pretty!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's bathroom...we ended up not using the shelf because it wouldn't fit above the plug well, but it still looks great and is way better than the old medicine cabinet that was previously there!
customer_reviews.author: Aim

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So I didn’t actually install it with the nails. I’m super busy and I’m a mom of three so I did what I could and used Velcro tape...hm. May I say that it actually was a beautiful idea! Had this mirror for over a month now and it’s magnificent. Easy cleaning and looks lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Simple bathroom mirror that was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Simple bathroom mirror that was easy to install. I like how it sticks out a little bit so I can put stuff on it. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Fredo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great mirror, just what I needed. Cheaper than Lowes, same quality. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: AJFHD

customer_reviews.title: Great looking vanity mirror!
customer_reviews.text: For the money it looks very nice and does not look cheap. I like the little shelf on the bottom. I am redoing a small bathroom and don't have space for a full size medicine cabinet. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Drellack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was delivered in perfect condition, easy to install the shelf and top mold and the prefect size for our 24" vanity. GREAT PRICE for the quality of the mirror. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lori Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Solid, sturdy mirror. Was packaged great! There is the mirror, the shelf and the top ledge and you have to add the latter two to the mirror. Had all the hardware included and all that was needed was a phillip's head screwdriver. It is absolutely perfect for the 1/2 bath. I like it so much I may have to buy another one. Classic look, smooth finish. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very worth it. Right now I use it at a vanity mirror but if needed I can always switch it out and place it in the bathroom. Also my husband put it together easily and quickly. It took Less that thirty minutes
customer_reviews.author: kiara harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking mirror for bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror with storage shelf . Looks nice. Out of 2 mirrors one had the hanging hooks missing from the back but were an easy find a hardware store for $1.00.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful mirror but it arrived broken. Going to try again.
customer_reviews.text: I love the mirror but it just arrived and sadly, the glass was broken. It was packaged well but you can see on the cardboard where it was poked/hit. I’m returning but ordering another one and hope it’s not broken.
customer_reviews.author: 1Happy Glamma

customer_reviews.title: Decent mirror for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive mirror for our half bath. Would have been nice if they had made the shelf a little smaller. Good mirror for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Love How It Looks
customer_reviews.text: This was certainly a great addition to my new bathroom. But the shelf does feel a little flimsy, even though the dowels were glued and the screws torqued nicely. The instructions didn't include the distance between the mounting holes, but I was pleased to find they were spaced exactly 19.2" apart -- or the diamond marker on a measuring tape. When comparing to other products that looks this nice, this is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: SourChipmunk

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I put it in a rental property and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Nich Wittenmyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We got this mirror mainly for our son's small bathroom. Not only does it look beautiful, but the added shelf is just what he needed for placing everyday items such as his toothbrush, toothpaste, comb and face wipes. We are very pleased! It was also very well-packaged for safe shipping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror with shelf
customer_reviews.text: It was safely packaged when I received it. It was in two boxes and styrofoam around it inside, I didn’t have any damage to product and that’s what I was most worried about! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bran

customer_reviews.title: It's simple and nice looking. The shelf is just what I was ...
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and nice looking. The shelf is just what I was looking for instead of a medicine cabinet. The only thing I think I would change is making it a little wider to cover more of the vanity area.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This whole mirror wasnt built correctly. We hung up the mirror and see that each side of the rectangular mirror is uneven/measured incorrectly when they put it together which in turn made the mirror hang lopsided. One side is higher than the other side and top and bottom arent exact. So disappointed. Keep looking for a different mirror.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We put in our bathroom love the small shelf great value compared to what you can find in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Britta

customer_reviews.title: Check for damage
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken mirror. Unfortunately I didn't open the box until today and my return window closed one week ago. If you purchase this item make sure to check for damage immediately after you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality mirror, the perfect size for my space and the shelf at the bottom is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love the basic-ness. But I also love having a cell phone and coffee mug spot since we have a small vanity top
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Get what you pay for...simple construction with no frills.
customer_reviews.author: The Philly Attorney

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice it was a little difficult to install just cause you have to a lot of measuring to get it up in the holes. But overall a nice mirror looks good in my bathroom. My husband even told me it was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: Looks better in real life
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to put together. Solid piece. Company loved the new edition to the guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Scratched glass mirror!
customer_reviews.text: It came packaged really well. Lots of padding and whatnot. Somehow the mirror was scratched like crazy. Need to return it, not happy! Returning item as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mirror, Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I really like it, and it's a great quality for what it is. No warps, no weird paint smell, overall very happy!

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged, nothing broken. Super easy to put together. Took a bit to actually hang. The screws need to stick out enough to catch, but not too much or it’ll wobble a bit. The shelf is sturdy enough, but don’t lean on it when you’re trying to look at your face up close.

customer_reviews.title: Quality mirror
customer_reviews.text: High quality mirror with ledge for small items. Just great look

customer_reviews.title: Good mirror for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror was just as described, was I damaged and was easy to install. Work definitely buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little mirror
customer_reviews.text: Got this for work bathroom, nice size for a small bathroom, shelf is handy, easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wittenauer

customer_reviews.title: Great value if it doesn't get scratched in transit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it came scratched thought it might come off if cleaned properly and it did not! Other then the scratch on the glass I like the mirror its self and have bought two just this time it came scratched!
customer_reviews.author: Hershal Collins

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It honestly looks just like pictured. Easy to install, sturdy but not too heavy. I don’t really have any complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: darling

customer_reviews.title: I love this mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mirror. I put it in my bathroom and it looks great! It's a nice quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good Bathroom mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know how durable it is since have only installed it 2 months ago. But family really likes it. Especially love the shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: nice product, good price, well made, easy install, comes with all mounting hardware, perfect for my application
customer_reviews.author: John C Habecker

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Meh...it's fine. It will hang in the bathroom until I don't like it anymore. It came with rubbed edges. See pic.
customer_reviews.author: Weegorgeous

customer_reviews.title: MDF
customer_reviews.text: Product is made with half inch MDF? Would be surprised how long it will last above a vanity. MDF and water are sworn enemies. Would not recommend this for an area that will be around water.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom Mirror with Shelf
customer_reviews.text: We like the mirror and the shelf comes in handy. It is good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jackie k

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: As the title states, this was easy to assemble. We are using it over a vanity in a very small bathroom so the small shelf is useful for us. It arrived quickly and was very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Two mirrors broken in a row so far
customer_reviews.text: I did not even take it out of the box. Broken on arrival. Replacement for that one, also broken. Third one on the way, maybe third time will be the charm

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged and protected, had all the pieces needed, including screws and drywall inserts, and I had it assembled up in about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Sones

customer_reviews.title: Shelf an issue, otherwise very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very appealing and a good size for money. Bottom shelf though doesnt hold much weight and loosens under continued use. Needs continually screwed back together, otherwise a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Allegra Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. The bottom shelve portion is too loose to use as a shelve and the corners came somewhat damaged. The mirror part is more like an acrylic mirror. Will use while I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: YV

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom mirror!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The paint is a little fragile and scrapes easily. Wish they had used something more durable, but that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better hardware
customer_reviews.text: Some of the installation hardware was substandard and we had to replace, but overall, once installed it is an attractive mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Mama B

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Love it on my vanity, just added some bright lights to it and bam!
customer_reviews.author: Gricell Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Harware
customer_reviews.text: I love the mirror but non of the hardware was included , on bought this for my summer camp so i just opened it this week was very sad to see no hardware !
customer_reviews.author: ELMA K HOUCK

customer_reviews.title: Makeup Mirror Framed Mirror with Shelf for Home
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is well worth it . This Vanity Mirror had real instructions that were easy to understand.and looks good out of the box. I will end with the service from this company is outstanding .

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Mirror is very nice exactly what I wanted but came with some scratches on it not happy about that

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and install
customer_reviews.text: It took about 20 minutes to put the pieces together of the mirror and then to hang it up on a wall. It came in good condition, looks just like the preview images, and it's simple to clean the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Great vanity
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I was looking for. Easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product. Only disappointment was a very very small chip on the left top corner. Thought it might be in the box with all wrappings but wasn't. Used white nail polish and chip gone!
customer_reviews.author: Terry P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mirror. I had to return it only because ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror. I had to return it only because it was a little to big for my powder room. Wish it came in a little smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Really nice casual style. I like the little ledge at the bottom too. Just what I want for my bathroom upgrade!!

customer_reviews.title: Not quite white
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror with a very good price point. The paint isn't quite white though, off white at best.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and just as pictured. Very sturdy . I used mine for a vanity mirror

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Vanity
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and was PERFECT for a vanity, which I used it for.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mirror for my daughters vanity! Super cute, easy to assembly, not to big just right for small space needs. Item was double boxed for protection of the glass and product had no damages at all.
customer_reviews.author: ENK

customer_reviews.title: Was not broken on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for cost. Same type of item was 2 to 3 times the cost at big box store

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mirror . Looks better than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck for 7 years
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken . Box only used 1 sliver of tape.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! We didn’t have any problems with this mirror! Took less than 2 minutes to put together and hang. And the little shelf is perfect for my kids toothbrushes!
customer_reviews.author: TStai

customer_reviews.title: Didn't love
customer_reviews.text: Did not love this. I returned it and spend more money on something I liked better.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo happy with this... just put it together today and it was so easy to assemble. Very white too.

customer_reviews.title: An elegant mirror will make the room.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a bathroom as the mirror over the vanity. I could not find one in the big box stores. It is attractive and adds nicely to the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass
customer_reviews.text: Would have been really nice if the mirror wasn't shattered when I opened the package. Really disappointing - I am returning and hesitant to buy again because it is likely the next one will be shattered with the packaging they are using
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best ever, it looks clean and is easy to hang, Very Happy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Broken mirror
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, the mirror came shattered. I really liked it! Too bad! I’m too nervous to order another one.

customer_reviews.title: Not white
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t look like the photos and was an off white or light tan color. I had to spray it white to make it match my bathroom but now it’s cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made this purchase it looks so beautiful in my bathroom and the added shelf comes in so handy to put my contacts and other small items it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: There was a weird extra line in the design around the mirror. I thought it would be okay but it is just annoying. At least it wasn't broken
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful mirror! I ordered it as a vanity piece and it’s perfect. No complaints!

customer_reviews.title: Nice vanity mirror
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to install, just don’t drop it, paint chips easily.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mirror for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous mirror for the price, used it to make my own makeup vanity mirror with the stick on Chende lights. Saved a lot of money and t looks great. The actual assembly of the mirror is not too bad as the hardest part was figuring out the measurements to stick on the lights. Overall very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Kogan

customer_reviews.title: It was much better than I expected for the low price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in my bathroom and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror with useful shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mirror for the price and the small shelf is a nice feature. It works perfectly in our newly remodeled bonus room bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Shattered Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the mirror...have had it delivered twice (shattered) fingers crossed 🤞🏾 that the 3rd time, it’ll come perfectly intact.
customer_reviews.author: Srey Custer

product_meta.title: Homfa Bathroom Wall Mirror Vanity Mirror Makeup Mirror Framed Mirror with Shelf for Home Multipurpose White
feature_bullets: 【MATERIAL】Made of high grade solid MDF material and comes with pure white finish, this storage bath mirror is stable, durable, non-toxic and looks elegant.

【MULTIPURPOSE】The framed mirror combined with modern style and with a storage space shelf for you to place some cosmetic, glasses, washing utensils, toiletries or other decorative items. You can install it in the bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and other occasions.
【GOOD QUALITY】With the thick mirror plate, made of high quality MDF board, this cosmetic mirror is strong and durable.

【EASY ASSEMBLY & SPACE SAVING】This bathroom mirror unit is easy to assemble and all mounting hardware is included. The mirror can be assembled on wall or over the table and comes space-saving, also provides extra storage without taking up valuable floor space.
【DIMENSIONS】Whole size: 22.4"L x 4.7"W x 26.8"H(57cm X 12cm X 68cm) MIRROR SIZE: 17*21.7 inches
